text: MOONEE (6) and SCOOTY (7) are outside The Magic Castle Mo purple and run-down. The kids sit against the wall in the shade of an alcove under the stairs outside the main offi The two take turns playing a game on a phone. They hear a small boy, DICKY (7), calling from the distan
Moonee! Scooty!!
What!?
Mooneeeeeeeeee! Dicky makes his way to the enclave moving fast.
Steadicam: Begin close on Dicky's screaming face and CONTINUOUS move from the side road parallel to Route 192 behind Dicky, following him running towards the motel.
Dicky arrives at the enclave.
Freshies at The Future! Moonee and Scooty are enthralled.
Freshies at The Future!!! They jump up and exit frame. We hold on the purple wall. “Celebration” by Kool & the Gang blasts over the OPENING TITLES that play out as we continue to hold on the wall.

Moonee, Scooty and Dicky make their way to the end of the motel’s driveway. PAN RIGHT to follow them and reveal Rou 192 in full.  The kids run to the adjacent property -- FUTURELAND INN (located a block West from The Magic Castle).

Moonee/Scooty/Dicky arrive at the entrance to FutureLand. Scuffed-up retro-futuristic rockets adorn the weather-dam sign in front, its logo embedded within a constellation. faded ‘Stay in the future... today!’ sign dangles below i Moonee/Scooty/Dicky run off the sidewalk and onto the law the shanty motel. They peer around a dirty wall. Their eyes widen.
That one. The blue one. The kids run upstairs to the second floor and look toward ground halfway down the walkway. They begin spitting downward.
I can get it farther than you, Moonee.
No way. I’1l1 totally get it much farther than you!

Yeah but I bet none of you can get it on the top! EXT. FUTURELAND INN - JANCEY’S ROOM - DAY GRANDMA STACY (younger than your average Grandma) steps o onto the walkway. She lights a cigarette, taking in her n environment. She looks to her left where a YOUNG MAN and PITBULL are lounging down the walkway. She nods to him. She continues to smoke. Something grabs her attention. Sh approaches her blue 90's Toyota Corolla to see a spit-cov windshield. A gob of spit shoots down onto it from above. looks to the upper floor.

What the fuck? HEY! Moonee/Scooty/Dicky slide back and laugh.  GRANDMA STACY (CONT’D) Are you kidding me over here? You get down here and clean this shit up now! The commotion causes Jancey and her young sister LUCI (4) emerge from the room. The kids continue to LAUGH HYSTERICALLY. Moonee jumps up and spits blindly through the rail.
Go home, you rachet bitch!
You ain’t shit, jit!
You are shit! Jancey gets hit by a gob of spit.
Gramma, he spit on me.
(offended) It wasn’t him, it was ME, stupid
Hey! I’m coming up there and I am fucking telling your parents! Moonee/Scooty/Dicky get up and race down the walkway of t second floor, the screaming back and forth persists.
Try it, bee-otch. I don’t even live here! Moonee/Scooty/Dicky LAUGH hysterically while running away Stacy fumes. Jancey and her little sister Luci stand by t door, confused.
Moonee, Scooty and Dicky race to the other side of Future and down the stairs. They run onto the parking lot.

Get the fuck back here!  4. DICKY’S DAD (40's) is sitting on a ratty lawn chair on th second floor, he spots them racing away. DICKY’S DAD Hey! Dicky... not another step. Get your ass over here. Now. Dicky stops as Moonee and Scooty keep running. Grandma St yells up to Dicky’s Dad.
Are they your kids?

Moonee and Scooty return to their home motel and run up t stairs to the third floor. WIDE on the two little kids as they walk down the entire length of the motel toward the elevator/stairwell in the (this is the first big reveal of the geography of The Mag Castle grounds). They reach Moonee’s home -- Room 323.

Moonee slides the window open from the outside, sticks he right arm in through the curtain and opens the door. HALLEY (22) is in pajamas and lying on the bed, smoking a watching “The Price is Right” on an old 19-inch tube television. Moonee and Scooty enter the room through the window, jump the bed and hop over Halley.
Hey, take your shoes off. Their shoes come off as they grab all the pillows in sigh make a fort.
Grandma Stacy, Jancey and Luci burst into the lobby. A ti looking AMBER (40's, day clerk) looks up.
I want to speak with the manager right now.
Can I help you with something?
Are you the manager?
No, but I’m in charge of...
I want to speak with the manager now.
Can I ask what this is regarding?
Two little shits that live on this property!
(turns toward offscreen) Bobby!
HARD KNOCKS on the door of room 323.

Yeah, what? Moonee runs over to the door and opens it to reveal BOBBY (50's), the motel manager -- focused, overwhelmed and cynical. He wears a wedding ring. He stands with Grandma Stacy/Jancey/Luci. Shy little Janc stands behind her livid grandmother and peers inside. Moo immediately SLAMS THE DOOR in his face and walks back to bed.
Moonee? Who’s that?
Nobody.
Shit, Moonee. What did you two do?
Nothin’.  6. Halley gets up off the bed. She drops her cigarette in he Mountain Dew can. Bobby begins speaking before the door swings all the way back open.
This woman's from next door. Says Moonee did something to her car.
You in 322?
No, FutureLand.
Oh.
Her and her friend Scoot spit all over my car and my kid here.
(from under the bed) It’s Scooty, not Scoot! Halley almost laughs.
You saw them do this?
I did. Their friend’s father told me that your kids are always pulling this shit.
He ain’t my kid.
Well, those two, whoever those are.
ointing at Moonee P g She’s mine.
I don’t give a shit. They spit on my car and over my Jancey here.
Okay, Halley, one, sort this out. Two, you smoke in the room again and you're outta here.
I’m not smoking.
Last warning, Halley.
Yeah, well, I’m not. Grandma Stacy watches Bobby walk off.
C’mon, get some paper towels, you two.
Moonee/Scooty approach BERTHA (40's) who is folding laund
Hola, Scooty y Moonee.
Toalla de papel.
Por Favor! Bertha grabs a roll of paper towels and hands it to Moone
The entire party (Halley/Moonee, Scooty, Grandma Stacy/Jancey/Luci) make their way over to FutureLand Inn.
These all yours?

These aren't mine. Well, they’re mine now. My daughter made me a grandmother when she was 15. So I’m looking after them until she stops acting like her stupid father. Halley offers Grandma Stacy a smoke. She accepts. Jancey quiet and stays close to her mother. GRANDMA STACY (CONT’D) (pointing to Jancey) She was on methadone for the first four weeks of her life. (MORE )
GRANDMA STACY (CONT’D) (pointing to Luci) Thank God, she had these two when she was locked up.
When’d ya move in, Gramma?
Today.
Whatta they charging you a week?
You can get that shit down to $240. Maybe even less knowing that shithead who works the front desk over there.
Grandma Stacy smokes a cigarette as she and Halley watch Moonee and Scooty wash the spit-covered car.

Got another one of those? Grandma Stacy rolls her eyes as she gives Halley a cigare As Moonee/Scooty clean the spit off the car, they both ma small talk with Jancey who watches curiously from the sha near her motel room.
What’s your name?
Jancey.
What kind of a name is Jancey?!
Hey, Jancey? I’m Moonee. And hey...
Yeah?
It sure would be a whole lot easier if we had someone else to help us. Scooty catches onto Moonee’s plan.
It sure would.
What would happen if someone was nice enough to volunteer?
They would get an award and it would say ‘the bestest ever!’ Jancey grabs a paper towel and goes over to help them.
HEY! Jancey, honey, what are you doing?
I’m cleanin’ up!
No, sweetheart, that’s not your job. It’s those two that have to clean up! Moonee winks at Jancey. Jancey smiles.
Aren’t you glad this happened because now it’s cleaner than it was before!
Oh let her fuckin’ help.
They're having too much fun. This is not supposed to be fun this is supposed to be work. This is not okay. Not okay at all.
Let them have a good time, it’s kids being kids.
I think it was very disrespectful. Not okay.  10.
Hey! We should clean that inside too, it’s a giant MESS! Scooty cheers.
You think they’re gonna get along if they don’t socialize?
Oh just like you?
Yeah like me, what are you trying to say? Look, you check them for lice yet?
Lice?
Half the kids here have lice. I can help you but you wanna be mean to me. So fine. I know this shit. The kids continue to playfully clean the old car.

Halley and ten other RESIDENTS of The Magic Castle are socializing, drinking and smoking on the balcony. Halley is hanging with her best friend and Scooty's mom, ASHLEY (23) on the stairs outside Room 341 where music is blasting. Some of the rooms’ doors are open and some clos GLORIA (60’s) struts over.

Hey! Listen up, motherfuckers. You have one of two choices. You can all keep it down OR... you can get a lady a beer. Gloria sits down and joins the crowd and pops open a beer which spills all over her.
I’m off tomorrow. Want me to take Moonee?  11.
No, it’s cool, we got our appointment tomorrow. Now, what would happen if we smoke the fattest of blunts right now? We hear Bobby off-screen.
Ladies and gentlemen, let’s wrap it up. We have over twenty guests this weekend and we’re already having noise complaints. A few residents can be heard protesting off-screen.
HALLEY is seated with a CASE WORKER (female, 30’s). Moone messing around with another LITTLE KID (4) while the adul talk.

Most of those rachet-ass bitches were doing extras... ya know, in the back room. (gives a handjob gesture) I'm not doin’ extras. I'm fuckin’ dancing for tips. That’s what I do. I said no... two days later with no warning Hector fires me... after not letting me up on stage all fucking night. Fuckin’ bullshit.
Okay, well... this will affect your TANF.
No shit. That's why I’m here.
Okay, you need to make a concerted effort to find at least thirty hours.
(frustrated) Yeah, well you find me thirty hours! I have applications in at every shithole up and down Irlo Bronson and the parks ain’t going to hire me.  12.
You can cover those up, Halley. Halley is thrown off for a second. She then realizes the worker is referring to her tattoos.
No, my record. And now that it’s summer and I got her during the day... C’mon.

I get it. But you’ve got to give benefits three job contacts a week or you'll be considered non- compliant. (reading file) And no child support. Halley just shakes her head. CASE WORKER (CONT’D) When is he getting out? Halley shakes her head again.

Moonee and Scooty sit in front of a “Welcome to Florida” mural. They are nodding off. An off-screen WHISTLE wakes up. Scooty’s mom Ashley stands in the front entrance of the f food waffle joint next door. She motions for them to go i back. As they run to the back, reveal that the two kids were sitting on the side of the huge ORANGE WORLD dome right n door.
Scooty and Moonee wait out back. Ashley comes out with a doggy bag.
Thanks, Miss Ashley. My mom wants to know if you want to go to O.B.T. tonight.
It’s Saturday night, isn’t it?  13.
(to Scooty) What was yesterday?
Yesterday? That was... Friday.
(to Ashley) Yes, today is Saturday.
Okay, then we’re gonna go.
Okay, I’1l tell her. Bye, Miss Ashley!
Bye, Mommy!

Moonee/Scooty/Halley eat the Waffle Home food picnic-styl a dilapidated playground next to the parking lot of the motel. A HELICOPTER loaded with TOURISTS lifts off next door. Th kids give it the finger as it lifts off for a tour.
Halley and Ashley are dressed up and ready to party. They deliver Moonee and Scooty to a NEIGHBOR’s room.
Thanks again. Let me know if they misbehave. (to Moonee) Behave, okay?

Halley and Ashley are in party mode. Latin food trucks, tricked-out cars, smoke, blasting music. The two girls ma their way around, socialize, eat food and watch as the ca drag race up and down the parking lot.
This is the best burrito I’ve ever eaten.  14. We follow the girls docu-style as they socialize. They ge alone time as they eat their food.
They chose Simone.
Are you fuckin’ kidding me?
I know. I been there way longer than that bitch.
I can’t even believe it. Fuck that.
The second I’m a manager you’re totally hired, I mean it. Halley’s night is ruined.
Moonee and Scooty approach Dicky’s room on the first floo FutureLand. Dicky’s Dad is lounging outside as usual.
Can Dicky come out and-- DICKY’S DAD Dicky’s being punished. He can’t come out. A MEAN CHIHUAHUA is staring at the kids. They walk away. Moonee stops and turns back.
Wait.
Moonee and Scooty knock on Jancey’s door. answers.
Yeah what?
Can Jancey come out and play? Grandma Stacy  15.
What? You gonna take her to spit on someone else’s car?
No, we're just playing.
What are you playing?
I dunno. Just playing.
Jance, those kids from the purple place wanna know if you wanna play?
I wanna play.
No further than Magic Castle, okay? Moonee, Scooty and Jancey run away.
Moonee/Scooty/Jancey walk past the front of Magic Castle headed West.
Don’t you live there?
Yeah but we have things to show you.
My grandma said no further than here.
Well we need ice cream. And this is a tour. Follow us. It’s okay. Jancey hesitates, then makes a decision to take her first step into uncharted territory.
Moonee, Scooty and Jancey walk by a gift shop on Route 19 that has a large Wizard sculpture over it.  16.
You think we’re going too far?
Just come on! Jancey stops and looks up at the giant wizard, entranced. After a beat, she moves on.
That's Wizzy. He’ll protect us. It’s safe.
Yeah, Wizzy’s a protector! Come on! Jancey continues to follow her two new friends.
They walk by a boarded-up old castle attraction.
That’s an old castle. Many battles must’ve happened there once.
The three kids walk past a thrift store. Jancey looks ahe and smiles.
They approach a structure that looks like a giant ice cre cone alongside the highway.
And THIS is where you get free ice cream.
Really?
The three kids beg for change from a TOURIST MOTHER AND DAUGHTER.  17.
Excuse me, Miss? Would you be so kind as to give us your change so we can have cones too?
Hopefully one day we can make enough money and then pay you back. The mother fishes for some change in her purse. SCOOTY (CONT’D) The doctor said we gotta eat ice cream right away.
Yeah, we have cancer and need ice cream. Jancey is in awe of the con job taking place before her e
Moonee, Scooty and Jancey walk by a group of HOMELESS liv in boxes outside a boarded-up Medical Center.
Here is where the homeless people live.
Moonee, Scooty and Jancey share a cone as they approach t Magic Castle. Moonee pops the last bite in her mouth, the stops herself. Moonee passes the last piece to Jancey.

Moonee and Scooty continue to give Jancey their tour into grounds of The Magic Castle. They stop and point at every door. The sequence will play as if we are condensing a documented tour with jump cuts between every line of dialogue.
216 is Abigahil. She’s a nice woman with lots of pillows. And sells drugs sometimes.
And 217 is a family that has a brother who stabbed someone on Valentine’s Day. The kids pass the elevator.
And nobody ever uses the elevator cause it smells like pee. The kids round a corner.
And 222 is a family that fights like all day.
And the woman who lives in here thinks she’s married to Jesus. 18. They approach the laundry room. Bertha is exiting the uti room and enters the laundry room.
And that’s Bertha. She smokes weeds.
Bobby is at his computer when the power goes off. The lig monitors and the hum of the air conditioning cut out.
Aw... shit.
‘The shit just happened? Bobby sits in the dark.

The electricity is shut off across entire motel. Bobby exits the lobby door. He’s pissed. WIDE SHOT, LONG TAKE of the entire East wing of the motel This allows us to see many of the motel’s residents filte out of their rooms in anger. (Gloria, RICO the Pool Guy, CUBBY, Haley, Ashley + Troy + 30 BACKGROUND)  19. Bobby continues to walk rapidly toward the back of the building trying to defuse the situation. We see Moonee, Scooty and Jancey hastily enter room 323. We hold on the complaining residents. A few take the opportunity to chill out and light up.
Bobby enters the small room and sees a thrown switch. He flips it back on.
The electricity goes back on and Bobby makes his way back outside as the residents CHEER. Bobby waves to the residents, triumphantly.
Drama’s over. You can all go back to your rooms now, folks. Have a nice day. People filter back inside the rooms.
Amber is behind the counter trying to calm down THREE ANN RESIDENTS, one of them is Gloria.

Totally unacceptable! I pay good fuckin’ money for my room and that includes A.C.-- ya know what I mean by A.C.? A Cunt. As in you are a cunt! Bobby enters the lobby. He’s pissed. He beelines to the b office.
Bound to happen at least once this summer. Everyone’s blasting their AC. Then you got microwaves, hot plates... fucking crock pots. These rooms weren’t designed to be extended stay suites.  20.
Bobby is reviewing the CCTV as we hear Amber continuing t try to calm down the residents. He squints at one of the camera feeds.
Amber? Amber enters the office.
Yeah?
Wasn’t crock pots. He points to the CCTV monitor. On one of the feeds is an image of Bertha leaving the utility room... and in come t little bodies entering and pulling the switch.
Of course.
Bobby exits the lobby, fast. He walks up the stairs and pauses at Bertha pushing her cart on the walkway.
Bertha, you leave that utility room unlocked again and you're gone. And don’t think I don’t know what you're doing in there. Bobby makes a “smoking weed” gesture.
None of that on the premises, comprende? He continues to the third floor.
Halley is sitting on the bed smoking a blunt. Huddled nex her are Moonee, Scooty and Jancey. They are playing a gam the iPad. A LOUD KNOCK at the door. The kids look at each other.  21.
Yeah?
Halley. Open the door. Halley looks over at the three kids. They look guilty.
(even-keeled) Fuckin’ A. What did you do now? She snubs out the blunt and grabs a can of air freshener blasts the air.
Halley, open up, now. Halley gets off the bed and approaches the door, pissed.
(whispering to Jancey) Don’t act guilty. Halley opens the door.
Yeah?
I have a video of the kids illegally entering the utilities closet and pulling the power.
They told me that I could be part of the club if I did it. Halley laughs -- causing Moonee and Scooty to laugh.
That’s lit.
Funny right? Happens again and you're gone. Second week of summer and there’s already been a dead fish in the pool--
It was an experiment. We were trying to bring it back to life!  22.
...and water balloons at some tourists. You don’t mess with tourists.
They didn’t tip us!
Damn non-tippers!
(turns to Bobby) Oh God. Are you serious?
Quite serious.
My God. This is unacceptable. Bobby realizes she is being facetious.
I’ve failed as a mother. Moonee, you've disgraced me! Halley bursts into a laughing fit that causes Moonee, Sco and Jancey to join in with giggles.
Don’t fuck with me right now, Halley.
Kids having fun. C’mon bro.
Yeah, so, I lost three hours of work. Work. You know what that is? Halley laughs.
And I'm talking to Ashley, by the way. If your friend leaves you in charge of her kid, he becomes your responsibility and you ain’t taking responsibility. And this one, isn’t she from FutureLand?
Oh whatevs. You gotta relax, man.  23.
You gonna redo my expense reports with your whatevs? Your kid just killed my night. I wanted to watch the game. You gonna pay me for the three hours I gotta work later?
Hey guys, pay the man for his three hours.
I don’t have any money.
I don’t have any money.
I have fourteen cents.
We only has fourteen cents. You’re shit outta luck.
Speaking of... I haven’t gotten this week’s rent from you.
You don’t think I know that. She closes the door. Bobby stands outside their door and breathing exercises to calm down.
I think I want to go home now.
Bobby and JACK (28) are wrapping a mattress in plastic.
Well, the purple looks nice. How much did that put you all back?
Narek spent 20K on it.
And he can’t afford an exterminator?  24.
Here. Bobby hands Jack duct tape. Jack rips a strip and seals t plastic. Bobby stops him.
No, Jack, I told you! Longer strips.
Then you do it.
I was just saying, you know better, you have to use longer strips. C'mon. They continue to seal the mattress. Jack is focused on th job and barely notices Moonee and Scooty as they peer in.
Whatcha doin?
Top secret work.
Really?
Guys, I need you outta here.
You guys are boring anyway.
That's right. See you later. The kids run off. Bobby and Jack continues to work in silence. Eventually Bobby begins removing the headboard.
Jesus.
Oh, worse than I thought.
Bobby and Jack throw the sealed mattress in the dumpster. words are spoken between them.  25.

Moonee and Scooty sit in the lobby licking dripping ice c cones. Their faces are covered with melted ice cream. We reveal that Bobby has been watching them intently. Arm crossed, leaning against the counter. Scooty's melting cone breaks apart and a piece hits the floor.
Okay, out! I warned you. One drop and you’re out. Now out.
Oh come on!
It’s gonna melt outside!
Obviously it’s melting inside too. The two kids exit the lobby.
Moonee and Scooty lounge in the enclave, remnants of ice cream all over their faces. Something grabs Scooty's attention...

Gloria! Gloria is strutting towards the pool with a towel ina bikini. EXT. FUTURELAND INN - JANCEY’S ROOM - DAY Moonee/Scooty pound on Jancey’s door, winded and panickin Dicky has joined the group. Grandma Stacy answers.
Hey, one light knock will do.
We need Jancey!!!  26.

Moonee/Scooty/Jancey/Dicky run onto the second floor balc and perch over the castle battlement to look down at the area -- Gloria sunbathes topless. The kids giggle as they spy on chanting “Boobies, boobies, boobies!” Bobby eventually saunters into the pool area.
Gloria, cover it up, please. I’ve told you this before. Thank you. Gloria resists.
These kids don’t need a health class right now.
Kids are in school, honey.
They're right there. (pointing) It’s summer break, Gloria.
Are you kidding me? She stands up, revealing her chest in all its glory.
You gonna stand there and give me shit about these? Are these making you uncomfortable, Bobby?
Cover it up. Thank you. The kids laugh and chant while Gloria continues to protes Finally Gloria covers up. The kids are upset.
On the driveway of The Magic Castle, Jancey and Dicky are walking home. Moonee and Scooty slip into the lobby.
I better get home before I get grounded again.  27. PATRICE (30's), the Magic Castle night manager, rolls up steps out of his BEAT-UP CAR.
Patrice enters, nods to Bobby. Moonee and Scooty are whistling into a fan.
I can’t whistle. Scooty makes an annoying sound into the fan.
Kids. Out. Patrice passes Amber wrapping things up behind the desk. Amber begins packing up and getting ready to go.
Yep.
Yeah. Bobby is sitting at the desk, tending to emails. He never looks away from the screen.
Hey, boss.
Narek will be in next week so we just need to take care of the invoices tonight, oh and do me a favor, put in that paint order, will ya? That tower needs touch- ups.
And that effing ice machine has been out of order for three months.
Yeah, fix that effing ice machine!
We need ice! People need ice.
That thing can’t be fixed. I'll deal with it. (to Patrice) (MORE )
Just talk to him about the re- order. Thank you. Oh, and keep your eyes on 151. There’s been traffic in and out all day. Patrice studies Bobby for a moment.
Are you... Bobby, that room’s been hot all week. I thought you were letting ‘em slide? Patrice lights his candle. Bobby just stares. He rubs his face.
I'll take care of it tomorrow.
Bobby leaves the lobby... he walks three steps and enters closest motel room to the office -- Room 101. He slams th door to his home.
Amber leaves.
Have a great fucking night. Patrice settles behind the counter.
What did I say? Get outta here!
Halley, Ashley, Moonee and Scooty sit on the stairs. Moon plays a game on the iPad while Halley and Ashley listen t hip-hop on their phone.
Outside Room 151, Bobby is watching a couple packing up a leaving.
This is fucked up, son.  29.
Don’t want to hear it. Let’s go.
I paid for the week, man. I want a refund.
Get the fuck outta here.

Moonee and Scooty sit on the steps of the front stairwell near the lobby. They are lit by the sodium-vapour lamps t illuminate the parking lot. In the background, residents the motel are out on their balconies socializing. A TAXI pulls into the parking lot. Moonee/Scooty perk up.
Patrice takes the candle out of his bag and searches for lighter.
The cab parks under the awning outside the lobby. A CABBI (50), shocked HUBBY (40) and confused WIFE (30) exit the
Wait, hold on, Sir. I think you got the wrong place.
This is the address you gave me.
(Portuguese) What did he say? The driver removes luggage from the back of the taxi.
Wait, I think we have a problem here. This isn’t where we are staying. Moonee and Scooty approach. The wife looks at them.  30.
Well, you want to check that address?
(Portuguese) We are going to the Magic Kingdom... you said you booked a hotel at the Magic Kingdom. That everything was taken care of. What is this place? We are not even on Disney property.
(Portuguese) Shit. I mean... Joao booked it for me. I don’t know.
(Portuguese) You had your assistant book our honeymoon hotel? Are you fucking kidding me?
CUT TO a conversation already in progress between our Hub and Patrice. The Husband has his phone to his ear. Moonee Scooty are watching. The Cabbie is smoking a cigarette outside.
(into walkie talkie) Bobby, can you help me out in here? Patrice turns back to the husband.
I can give you the AAA rate, how about that?
No. No no, I am not asking for a discount.

Well I’ve already said, because you booked it online, if you want a refund you have to do it online, you'll get it back on your statement within 2-3 weeks. The husband hangs up the phone and turns to his wife.  31.
(Portuguese) He’s not answering. (to Patrice in English) No, you don’t understand. I don’t care about a refund. We just need a place to stay.
And you got a place to stay. You have room 325.
That’s two rooms down from my room! Bobby enters the lobby.
What’s up? (to kids) You two. Out.
The cabbie impatiently smokes his cigarette. The kids sta through the window.
That lady is pretty.
Yeah. But... I think she’s going to cry. I can always tell when adults are about to cry. The cabbie opens the door of the lobby.
Hey man. I’m going to have to charge you waiting time. I got other calls.
(Portuguese) What is he saying? The husband is overwhelmed.
Wait, Sir. I'll get the new address. Hold on.  32.

Hey, look, just call the company when you're ready, it’s a busy weekend for us. I’m losing fares. The cabbie snubs the cigarette and enters the lobby. We s that he is settling the bill with the husband as the kids watch through the glass. Moonee eyes the luggage and then looks to Scooty. He nods winks. The two kids grab the couple’s luggage and move it into the lobby.
The cabbie exits and drives away. The husband is busy on phone, scouring the internet.
It’s almost midnight, one of the busiest weekends of the year around here. The only other room you’1l find tonight is another single somewhere along this stretch. Take your pick.
Listen, do you see my wife there? She's Brazilian. They LOVE this place. She’s been coming here since she was a kid and her dream was to have her honeymoon in Disney.
You just got married? Wife notices kids have taken the luggage inside.
Listen, trust me. If I brought my girl to this place on our honeymoon, she would have divorced my ass. I feel for you. But what do you want me to do, fella?
(very broken English) Hey! Get away from that!
They're just trying to get a tip.  33.
